name: magnetic-flux
effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user manipulates magnetic fields,
which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats
of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
